item.title: Template Injection
item.description: Template engines are a type of software used to determine the appearance of a web page. Developers often overlook attacks that target these engines, called server-side template injections (SSTIs), yet they can lead to severe consequences, like remote code execution. References Client Side Template Injection (CSTI) Template Injection in Action Web Application Penetration Testing Notes pentest-guide/Server-Side-Template-Injection at master · Voorivex/pentest-guide SSTI (Server Side Template Injection) HowToHunt/SSTI.md at master · KathanP19/HowToHunt
